channel.description: Recent content on Roxo | Creative Design Agency

item.title: Predicting interest rates using K-fold CV and LASSO & OLS regression
item.description: In this piece I will analyse the data on interest rates in the Lendign Club. First I will conduct the ICE of the data together with visualisation of the variables disributions and correlations for better understanding.

item.title: Oxford Hack 2020 - Meetable MVP
item.description: Oxford Hack 2020 - Meetable What is Meetable? Meetable is an app that enables you to find friends during the lockdown. It matches you with a small group of other students from your university every week and sets weekly challenges for you basing on your common interests.

item.title: Gapminder Data Analisys - Data & Correlation Analysis
item.description: Gapminder revisited The Gapminder data is know worldwide thanks to Hans Rosling and his webstie data in Gapminder World. The data downloaded from the website was cut into the data frame that contains just six columns from the larger .

item.title: Gender Pay Discrimination - Statistical Hypothesis Testing
item.description: Omega Group plc- Pay Discrimination At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc., the headquarters of a large multinational company, the issue was raised that women were being discriminated in the company, in the sense that the salaries were not the same for male and female executives.

item.title: Design Inspiration: The Best Projects From November
item.description: Black Lines brand identity, by & Smith Black Lines wants it to be as easy to serve a Negroni as it is a pint of lager.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
